actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish in the State of California the Toyon National Urban Park.

summary.text: Establishes in the State of California the Toyon National Urban Park. Establishes a Toyon National Urban Park Advisory Commission to advise and assist the Secretary of the Interior in carrying out the provisions of this Act. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish in the State of California the Toyon National Urban Park.
